sentence: The oriental is excellent service personified with butlers on each floor ready to look after your every whim
We arrived at the Mandarin Oriental after a 26hour trip for the first 3 nights of our honeymoon and we were blown away by the service we experienced at this hotel
Room service for breakfast at a very early hour was excellent
We had a late dinner at the Italian restaurant where food was very good and service very professional
As most of the guests here my reason is to have a great service and peace and quiet
Wonderful gracious staff with deep knowledge of the business Bangkok and Thai culture impeccable facilities and wonderful atmosphere
Wow what a wonderful hotel looks fabulous guest care is amazing location is ideal Staff are without doubt the best I have come across very thoughtful and caring
The best hotel I have ever had the pleasure of staying at with impeccable service world class drinks and a wonderful view
The service in the Hotel was excellent and second to none
Fabulous hotel with great staff
Where else in the world are you greeted by every staff member by name and welcomed home every time as though you were there yesterday
The treatments are very good but the reception area is not big enough
The service levels are exceptionally high
No doubt there must be a highly professional and friendly staff
After all after midnight skytrain service is not available anymore
The staff were all so nice and sweet but it was a bit much
Stayed only one night but extremely impressed by the staff and level of service
This Hotel does not disappoint in any way and the level of service for all areas is just World Class and can not be bettered globally
Management needs to talk with this individual as well as the crew members
The ambiance service and facilities but most of all the service

There are nice things about the hotel like the friendly staff but our room was incredibly worn down scratches on the walls stains on the furniture carpet we were given the worst room on the floor even though the hotel did not appear full and the dress code is antiquated
As a tourist you can get the service what you needed
The staff is lovely at night most of the times but they are a bit cold for the kind of service I have gotten used to in Thailand
Service was excellent as everywhere but the atmosphere inside was chilly and the Thai food tasteless
I have been treated with the best service for example when I have breakfast every morning I do not have to keep repeating my orders everyday as they know my routine beverage and breakfast dishes
Breakfast was busy but any concerns I had about that were quickly assuaged by the prompt service and fantastic buffet
Kay and Khun Peter Budhavong were so graciousI always like to mention Housekeeping because they are pretty much the most important team for a guest
For example on checkin the front desk made us meal reservations instead of sending us to the concierge and she ordered us box lunches for our early tour departure the next day
I wish they would have made that clear before I sat down with my family and was refused service
‍ ♀ ️The only negative I have to say is although the concierge is helpful I think they push the wrong restaurants tours to fill numbers
But lobbys cafe employees are not kind
Beware of rude staff
It is very special and if you can stay there for a few nights and if you ask their concierge staff any of their staff for some help they will go out of their way to look after you
Plus I hate the fact that they always have to hide the fact that tax and service fee is not included
I hope my comment help the team to improve the services
The service is even better if that is possible
Well at the Mandarin Oriental they do from the restaurant staff room attendants receptionists to the pool boys the staff are not just personable but polite courteous knowledgeable and helpful
I also recommend a negroni or two in the bamboo bar one is never enoughThe Gym has the latest equipment and if the staff could exercise for you
